poliastro.czml¶

Description¶

This subpackage provides tools to extract CZML (Cesium Language) data for the visualization of orbital trajectories and spacecraft motions.

Modules¶

  • czml_utils: Utilities for computing the intersection and projection related to ellipsoids.

  • extract_czml: Routines for extracting information from CZML data.

Modules

czml_utils
